title: Dr Seuss: How the Grinch stole Christmas
brief_description: Presented here are two adaptations of stories for children by the much loved Dr. Seuss: “How the Grinch stole Christmas” and “If I ran the zoo”. Narrated by Walter Matthau, “How the Grinch stole Christmas” is the story of the people from Who-ville…”Every Who in Who-ville liked Christmas a lot…But the Grinch, who lived just north of Who-ville, did not!”. “If I ran the zoo” tells a tale of young McGrew and his fantastical animals like the scraggle-foot Mulligatawny and the elephant cat,”Young McGrew’s made his mark. He’s built a zoo better than Noah’s whole ark”. Narrated by Brett Ambler.
